page.title: 08Recreation
page.content: Much of the leisure time of 12-14 year olds at Sale Girls' Grammar School is occupied by watching television, listening to music, dancing, reading and attending Guides and youth clubs. The most popular hobby is collecting; items range from coins to dolls. Many keep pets, sew, cook and do jig-saws. Computer games, cards and board games like monopoly are the favourite indoor games. Swimming and tennis are the most popular sports but badminton, ice skating and horse riding also have numerous participants. Sale Water Park provides facilities for various water sports and has guided nature walks. Of the many sports clubs and parks in Sale, the Leisure Centre with its three pools and sports hall is the most used. Sale Harriers Club encourages young people in all branches of athletics.
